commit.message:
Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn build 20220228.4

Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset
 From Version 4.1.0-2.21617.4 -> To Version 4.1.0-5.22128.4

nodes.body:
added a subscription for roslyn 17.1 to point to our vs17.1.

Context: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/7285

need to confirm if this is worth taking for 17.1
@benvillalobos what part of #7285 made you think that we needed to add a new subscription here? Because we shouldn't need it so maybe we can clarify for the next round.

It must have been the transition step here: ` Update main subscriptions to the new channel (this can be done after release)
`. I hadn't been kitten for months at the time and figured any/all existing `main` subscriptions get moved to "17.1". I'm pretty sure I saw roslyn and figured "Well the 17.1 roslyn bits should point to the 17.1 msbuild channel"
